function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of mathematical equations without proper context","Impact":"Misinterpretation of resilience metrics leading to incorrect decisions","Mitigation":"Provide contextual explanation of the equations and their application in the specific domain","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, simulation software","People":"Research community, policymakers, industry professionals","Owner":"Research community, experts in resilience metrics"},{"Description":"Lack of clarity in defining speed of recovery and performance levels","Impact":"Inaccurate calculation of resilience metrics and misrepresentation of system resilience","Mitigation":"Define and standardize the measurement of speed of recovery and performance levels in the specific context of air transportation systems","Technologies":"Quantitative analysis tools, industry standards","People":"Data analysts, system resilience experts","Owner":"System resilience experts, industry professionals"},{"Description":"Failure to account for environmental and human factors in resilience calculations","Impact":"Underestimation of system vulnerability and insufficient preparedness for contagious disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Incorporate environmental and human factors into resilience metrics and consider their impact on disease propagation","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, population modeling software","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials, urban planners","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planning professionals"}]}
